parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>False. The post does not refer to any parliamentary candidate.  It promotes the work of Romsilva, a Romanian state forestry agency, showcasing images from Cozia National Park. There is no mention of any political party or candidate.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform, and aims to reach a wide audience, not just specific individuals. The use of hashtags further suggests a broad reach.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>False. The objective of the post is to promote Cozia National Park and the work of Romsilva.  There is no attempt to influence voters in favor of or against any candidate or party in the parliamentary elections.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>True. The post can be considered a form of public relations or corporate communication, similar to a news story about environmental conservation. It presents information about a natural park and the agency's activities. It does not advocate for or against any political position.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>Not applicable. The post does not express personal opinions related to the elections.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>9231434420250210</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post is a paid advertisement by Romsilva, promoting Cozia National Park. The content focuses on environmental conservation and does not mention any political candidates or parties.  The post's objective is to raise awareness of the park and Romsilva's work, not to influence the parliamentary elections.  While the post falls under the "POLITICAL" category due to its presence on Facebook's ad library, this categorization is based on the platform's broad definition and does not automatically equate to electoral propaganda. The post lacks any elements that would constitute electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006 and Article 98 t) of LEGE nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>FALSE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates/>
<responsible-party-or-group>Regia Nationala a Padurilor - Romsilva</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police/>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
